means: 祈祷，祷告( pray的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Joyce traipsed from one doctor to another, praying that someone would listen.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔伊丝从一位大夫奔波到另一位那里，期盼着有人会认真听她的话。

sentence.Network_en: The boys, if my eyes did not deceive me, were praying.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果我没有看错的话，那些男孩子正在祈祷。

sentence.Network_en: I kept praying that the DJ would speed the music up.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不停地祈望唱片播放师能加快音乐的节奏。

praying 夏, praying 诺, praying 者
the evil is past praying for ., 那个恶人已经无可救药了.

when he went down with the knee injury , while Jesus was praying to find his shot again and Pierce was relegated to being the fourth quarter assassin , it was little was there .当加内特因为膝伤倒下之后，当雷阿伦还在祈祷上天让他尽快找回神准手感时，当皮尔斯在第四节的关键时刻的作用减少时，朗多毫不犹豫地挺身而出。

entry.def: When people pray, they speak to God in order to give thanks or to ask for his help.

example.ex: He spent his time in prison praying and studying...
example.tran: 他把狱中的时间都用于祈祷和学习。

example.ex: Now all we have to do is help ourselves and to pray to God.
example.tran: 我们现在所要做的就是自助并向上帝祈祷。

entry.def: When someone is hoping very much that something will happen, you can say  that they are praying that it will happen.

example.ex: I'm just praying that somebody in Congress will do something before it's too late...
example.tran: 我只是在祈求国会中会有人在还来得及的时候做点什么。

example.ex: One can only pray that the team's manager learns something from it...
example.tran: 大家也只能希冀球队教练从中汲取教训。

entry.tran: （用于不太友善或气愤但镇定地提问时）请问
entry.def: Pray is used when asking a question in a rather unfriendly way or in an angry but calm way.

example.ex: And what, pray, do you buy and sell, Major?
example.tran: 梅杰，请问，你都买卖些什么？

entry.def: Pray was used to add politeness to a command.

example.ex: I beg your pardon, pray continue.

auth_sentence.content: We are praying for a change in the markets.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are praying for a change in the markets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are praying for a change in the markets.

auth_sentence.content: We are just praying he sees the right path.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are just praying he sees the right path.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are just praying he sees the right path.

auth_sentence.content: They are praying for the welfare of the country.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are praying for the welfare of the country.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are praying for the welfare of the country.
